name: Otterna
description: Otterna is a Hardcore Platformer Adventure Game.

name: Who Shuffled My Shapes?
description: Your shapes have been shuffled and it’s up to you to fix them! Get your 20 new puzzles back in order, it sounds simple but it’s not. With some of the simpler puzzles offering over 43 quintillion possible configurations finding the single correct one will be a challenge!

name: WWF Attitude
description:
Now featuring over 40 of your favorite WWF Superstars including Stone Cold Steve Austin, Sable, The Rock, Mankind, The Undertaker, and D-Generation X!

Customize your own wrestler's move sets and costumes.

Two-man commentary featuring Shane McMahon and Jerry "The King" Lawler.

name: WCW Mayhem
description:
Out Of Hand. Out Of The Ring.

*Create a wrestler
*Over 50 WCW Superstars
*Six match types
*All TV and PPV Venues
*Real Ring Entrances
*12 Backstage areas.

name: Rampage 2: Universal Tour
description: Players choose one of the three original monsters to rescue. The player then uses the characters in the part of the world where the rescue is held. They work as a collective to break buildings, eat people, and destroy cars and this creates competition among players. When a player (literally) unlocks George, Lizzie, or Ralph, then they become playable characters. Once all the monsters are rescued, aliens begin to invade the earth, leaving the monsters the only ones who can save the planet they just helped partially destroy. After fending off the invasion on Earth, the monsters rescue Myukus (a cyclops-like alien) from Area 51 before chasing the aliens through space, destroying the aliens' bases throughout the Solar System and eventually rampaging through their homeworld.

name: Panel Quiz Attack 25
description: A quiz show produced by ABC Television and broadcast every Sunday from 1:25 p.m. on the TV Asahi network. It was the only viewer-participation quiz show that was regularly broadcast in Japan. The respondents who answered the quiz correctly won a panel, and the winner was the one who got the most panels. The recording was held at the Asahi Broadcasting Corporation headquarters studio in Hotarumachi, Osaka.

name: Badland Party
description: Badland Party continues its creators quest to perfect atmospheric side-scrolling adventures with stunning graphics and innovative physics-based gameplay. Witness the award-winning series take the visual allure another step forward, introduce dozens of new characters to play with and allow friends to play together in both local and online multiplayer modes. Or enjoy a single player adventure together with an AI companion.

name: The 10th Planet
description: The 10th Planet is a cancelled game from Bethesda Softworks. It would have been a sci-fy space combat game, slatted for release in 1997. Playstation and Sega Saturn version were also planned.

name: Ninja Fighter
description: A handheld electronic game released in 1994.

name: Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom
description: Wing Commander 4 is one of the greatest space sims of all time, and some even consider it the greatest one of all. It is one of those games that did everything right. This is one of the few games that actually successfully manages to integrate a lot of FMV into the action, mostly because it uses trained film actors and directors. The combat is straightforward, fluid, and entertaining. The characters are as believable and memorable as they come. The orchestrated music -- just perfect. Finally, its enthralling story is both deep and plausible -- a combination that is often lost in modern games. There is simply no reason not to play this game and, once you do start playing, you will find it hard to think of a reason why you should stop.

name: OutRun
description: Port of OutRun as a tabletop handheld, released in 1988.

name: Road Race
description: Handheld electronic game released in 1989.

name: Attack on Titan 2: Singular Target
description: A new episode "Singular Target" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and as a "Scout Mission" in "Another Mode".

name: Revenge Master
description: Help the king to take revenge, kill as many traitors as possible and take them with you to hell before they get to you.

name: Before the Last Hour
description: Play a unique rogue like game, mixing item and card games in an original post-apocalyptic universe. Explore, upgrade your equipment, fight unique monsters and bosses. And unlock all the secrets of the Before The Last Hour universe.

name: Uligo: A Slime's Hike
description: Join Uligo the slime in this sticky journey to find the way back home. Jump, dash, get launched, stick to any surface to triumph over any obstacles in your way. Will you overcome the dangers ahead?

name: Lunaela
description: An beautiful open world anime RPG. Play offline or online.Fight against enemies and collect materials to evolve your character. Complete your card collection and explore a world of 6Km2 with 12 different classes at your disposal.

name: Scholar
description: Scholar is a spelling game with RPG elements. Level up your hero as you spell words and unlock new skills. Fight powerful bosses at the end of each level and get that loot.

name: Sire Abandon
description: It is an RPG type game, in 2D retro. You play as a knight (Sir Abandon) who will evolve through many levels. You will have to farm certain levels several times to increase your experience and gain levels, as well as collect enough gold to improve your equipment.

name: Commando Mountain Rescue
description: Beat The Mountain - Save The Day!

name: Trash Patrol: Academic Version
description: Trash Patrol is a local cooperative multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Break into a house, look for something to steal together with your raccoon friends. Don’t forget to wash and dry all items carefully! And watch out for the homeowner - They are not amused to see you within their home

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Vorax
description: Vagrus’s first free DLC adds the companion called Vorax, an Undead chef of considerable renown and unknown origins. A jovial and garrulous character, Vorax has many talents and tools at his disposal, whether while traversing the wasteland or on the battlefield.

name: Furi: Onnamusha
description: Rediscover Furi with the Onnamusha Rider: a powerful fighter that alternates between two stances: fast and agile or slower but lethal, until she's able to unleash the devastating power of the Star.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Ragnarök
description:
The nightmare is almost over. Hitler’s hell-cult has been torn apart, along with the occult mastermind behind it – yet the few surviving cultists have retreated deep into Hell, and have put into motion the mysterious Projekt Ragnarök.
Schweiger is the only one able to guide Alpha Squad to wherever they have hidden – to where they will take their last stand against the cult, and stop whatever ritual of annihilation threatens the world.
Conquer Hell in the devastating 2-part Ragnarök campaign, and hopefully find some answers in the process!

name: Awesome Cat Puzzle
description:
Awesome Cat Puzzle is a classic logic game. This cat is a small animal and like a fish, but a bad dog wants to catch him when he tries to get the fish! Be a hero and help to run out this awesome cat. You must arrange tiles to escape. This is a really survival journey but you can help the cat!
Please don't block on any levels and try to finish a game because in the other reason the dog catches the cat!

name: Room Escape in Voxels
description:
Do you like the challenge? You must try this game and solve all riddles! It is a classic puzzle with many different unique game mechanics (point and click, hidden object, perceptivity riddle, logic brain teaser, mathematical puzzles and more).

Try escape form many rooms using your observations. All puzzles have a logical solutions so you can test your brain cells! But if you do not give advice, use the hint system!

name: Love is… in Small Things
description: "Love is... in small things" is a hidden picture game with emotional art by artist 'Puuung'. It is a healing game that can relieve stress and excitement like relaxation, and enjoy the charming emotional coloring game that spreads at your fingertips.

name: HackStack
description: Enter the cyberverse and become the best crypto-hacker with lightning fast multitasking action. HackStack is designed to put you in a flow state with high APM gameplay. Tap, swipe, hold, aim, and solve your way through a wide variety of modules to become the lord of the cyberverse. Don’t let the modules stack up too high or prepare for an overflow!

name: Ghost Stories
description: You play the part of a Taoist monk with supernatural powers. Your final goal: vanquish Wu-Feng, the wicked Lord of Darkness. In Ghost Stories, the forces of good won't get a break – the ghosts will attack you unceasingly. You'll have to team up to repel the attack of the ghosts, zombies and other abominations under Wu-Feng's command. Be stronger and more clever than Evil and the village will be saved. Will you be brave enough to vanquish Wu-Feng and his minions?

name: Ramses Classic
description: 'Ramses' is the original conversion of an amiga version developed in 1992, which deliberately left in the style of this period of time. Therefore all graphics and sounds are left unchanged to obtain the original retro look. Finish building your pyramid before your time is come. Get money and worker to reach this target. Because the original game was played with mouse and there where no problems with small operating elements, we must change the use for modern smartphones. On small screens we use a special zoom ability to extend the screen and the controls on it.

name: Linq!
description: Linq is a challenging and minimal puzzle game with handcrafted levels and aesthetic design. Connect the nodes and complete the whole path! Warning: you can only start and finish on filled nodes!

name: When You Wish Upon a Star
description: "When you wish upon a star" is a visual Nobel in the genre of love comedy that unfolds the story through the player's choice.

name: SegaSonic Bros.
description: A unreleased falling blocks puzzle game featuring different colored Sonic the Hedgehogs.

name: Off The Grid
description:
Welcome to Off The Grid, the heart-pounding Extraction Royale where survival is just the beginning. Dive into a dark, cyberpunk world crafted by visionary director Neill Blomkamp (District 9) and prepare to augment, adapt, and dominate like never before!

Gear up with custom cyberlimbs and hundreds of weapon combos, modifying your body and arsenal mid-fight. Extract high-value loot, outsmart your enemies, and transform into a force of destruction. You’re not just fighting to survive—you’re fighting to be the last one standing.

name: Double Jump NFT
description:
The first race-to-finish, P2E platform-royale game on the Solana Blockchain! Race against other Jumpers across the world in a medley of thrilling maps to finish first.

Pay $JUMP to enter global token tournaments for a chance to earn even more $JUMP! Jumper NFTs can be staked for $JUMP, which produce various amounts of daily tokens based on Jumper rarity. Participate in JumpDAO to vote on upcoming maps, new skins, entrance fees for token tournaments, and staking rewards!

name: Eikan wa Kimi Ni 4
description: Eikan wa Kimi Ni 4 is a baseball simulation game developed and published by Artdink.

name: Temirana: The Lucky Princess and the Tragic Knights
description:
This is a world in which status and occupation are all determined by the month of birth. At the eastern end of the country of Temirana, about fifteen years ago, a baby with a bruise on her forehead was born as the third princess. The baby was rumored to be a "cursed princess" and was forced to live separately from her family in a mansion away from the castle, but a big turning point came for her.

One day, my 16th birthday is just around the corner. At the venue of the duel tournament "Helis Duellum," I saw five men shining in a dazzlingly strong "light."

- Yes, this "cursed princess" had special luck. When her life is in danger, things and places shine as if to tell her to avoid them. Those around her who knew the princess's luck advised her that these men were dangerous people and that’s why they shone... but it was different from the light she had seen so far. Believing in her intuition, the princess decided to invite those who seemed to shine into her knighthood order. But some of them have no experience in swordplay, nor are they even interested in being knights. Will the princess be able to overcome the calamity that is about to occur with only a small group of five knights?

name: Dear My Cat
description: Join the journey of virtual pet sim! Every cats from Dear My Cat embarks on a journey on the beautiful Sky Island.

name: Men in Black: The Game
description: Men in Black: The Game is an officially licensed game based on the 1997 film Men in Black. The plot is unrelated and it is a survival horror game as opposed to being a comedy.

name: Baby Felix Creativity Center
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch
description: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch is a bundle of both Shiro to Kuro no Alice games.

name: Red White Yellow Stingray
description: A puzzle game to connect BGM by erasing blocks. For those who want to be healed by the music of HYLE.

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Mountain Cottage
description: I visited a mountain cottage as my friend recommended. While going for a little walk, I unexpectedly fell over the cliff...!!

name: Mahjong: Magic Casual Puzzle
description: The Mahjong board game is a popular puzzle game all over the world!

name: Flatout Pixel Racing
description: Go flatout! No brakes needed! A retro arcade top down racing game in a pixel art style.

name: Golf Club Wasteland / Aspire Ina's Tale Bundle
description: Whether through art or storytelling, some games have something special that transport you directly into their worlds.

name: Top Speed 2: Drag Rivals & Nitro Racing
description: The ultimate drag race in the city streets, featuring dozens of cars!

name: Beautiful Mystic Survivors
description: Roguelite bullet-hell meets sexy anime in Beautiful Mystic Survivors, as you rise to help gorgeous heroines destroy countless invading monsters. Plan your builds, upgrade heroines, and survive against the clock. Experience polished 3D graphics, flashy VFX, and surrounded by thousands of monsters.

name: Explosion
description: An indie puzzle game based on satisfying explosions and an exciting story. Use your wits to solve levels with varying TNTs and progress through the fun and exciting story of Amber, you, and the Corporation!

name: Memory Shards
description: Live the story of Jake, a man stuck in the past as he finds out a way to understand it by playing an old JRPG from his childhood. This is a small introspective drama story.

name: Curro
description: Curro is a first person shooter game. Set your record in the world generated endlessly.

name: Soda Sabotage
description: Soda Sabotage is a Sci-fi 2D top-down shooter, where the player guns his way through 25 levels and 5 bosses belonging to a soda weapon factory using their own weapons against in order to disable the evil soda weapon making factory. Shoot, dash but most importantly survive!

name: Heroes of Time
description: A turn-based JRPG game which mixes science-fiction and medieval fantasy making young teens from the future contrasting with medieval people and creatures. Get ready to make your own choises to save the future.

name: Drift Type C
description: A multi-discipline real-physics driving game where the ghosts are actual ghosts. Drive 50+ real spec cars right from the factory on 100+ miles of track to free the God of Time. Master Drift, Time Attack, Off-road, Rally, and even a few head to head races against bad AI. Robust Creative Mode.

name: Candlelight
description: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

name: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered
description: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered is a survival horror stealth game that parodies cheap 90's edutainment and never takes itself too seriously. Explore Baldi's schoolhouse and try to find all 7 notebooks, but don't get caught by Baldi! He wants to play hide-and-seek, but something... Isn't right. Luckily you have a slew of items you can find and use to your advantage, but Baldi also has friends who can cause problems for you if you're not careful. And remember, Baldi hears every noise you make, so do what you can to stay quiet!

name: Animal Babysister Fighter
description: As the zombies and monsters are taking over quite a few planets in the galaxy, animals are losing their habitants and your mission is to protect the animals to take the spaceship to the shelters on the first colony star built by human beings.

name: The Bathhouse
description: The Bathhouse is a Japanese horror game.

name: The President
description: The secret service discovers that a group of gunmen wants to kill the president, so they send Paul to investigate the area. Upon arriving in the area, Paul must send the information to the secret service and eliminate the men who are there.

name: Motorcross Mania 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bug Explorers
description: Bug Explorers is an educational minigame collection with an insect theme.

name: Pimiento
description: Pimiento offers 3 daily word-guessing games. They rely on a dictionary where semantically closed words got pushed together in a gigantic, cloudy database, so that two given words get a "similarity score". In each mini-game, each guess must be a word and the game will tell you how close to the secret word you are.

name: Warframe: Rise of the Warlords
description: Confront warring factions throughout a sprawling interplanetary system as you follow the guidance of the mysterious Lotus and level up your Warframe, build an Arsenal of destructive firepower, and realize your true potential across massive open worlds in this thrilling, genre-defining third-person combat experience.

name: The Felix the Cat Trivia Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Felix the Cat
description: Felix the Cat is an unlicensed Russian Genesis port of the NES game of the same name. The game is notable for it's graphic game over screen, which shows Felix ripping his face off.

name: Felix the Cat DS
description: Felix The Cat DS is a rom hack of New Super Mario. Bros that recreates the levels of the NES game Felix the Cat.

name: Felix Interactive Coloring Pages
description: Sin descripción

name: Madness: Friday Night Funkin'
description: Sin descripción

name: Four Footed Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Akirry Roll
description: A simple ball-rolling game

name: Puppy Luv: A New Breed
description: Sin descripción

name: Jamir
description: Jamir is a free-to-play fast paced sci-fi tactical shooter created by one person. Master your abilities and items to destroy creatures and enemies. Upgrade your character, guns, abilities and items to become the most powerful along the globe.

name: Cate West 2: The Velvet Keys
description: Sin descripción

name: 101 Dalmatians
description: A handheld game based on the 101 Dalmatians franchise. This is not the version that is based on the live action movie.

name: Mob Hunter
description: Challenge the most terrible and severe monsters! Find out the truth about the order of hunters in a new third-person slasher! Unique combat system, customization, pumping and a bunch of monsters!!!

name: Spearhead
description: Spearhead is the story of agents who join secret organizations in a chaotic world surrounded by infectious diseases. Experience the story of six agents joining.

name: Samurai Story
description: Rescue the captive daughter from the clutches of the local Yakuza faction

name: Cyber Bay
description: In the distant future, when every person is under the control of the system, only one brave warrior tries to resist it.

name: Lamafox - Hide and Seek!
description:
Play hide and seek with Fredfred! Can you find him in the colorful worlds? Lamafox is a creative and surprising puzzle mobile game for kids and adults.
Try out all the possibilities that come to your mind to solve the puzzles. Also use the different abilities of your smartphone or tablet. The puzzles don't always have to be solved with your finger! Have fun and try everything, because there is no game over.

name: Jump Over the Age Collection
Citizen Sleeper: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Evolving Empires
description: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Evolving Empires is the second expansion to the turn-based space 4X strategy game Interstellar Space: Genesis. Adds two major new features to the game, Evolutions and Minor Civilizations. These features provide tons of new content, 7 new leaders and 2 new music tracks!

name: Disney's Beauty and the Beast: LCD Wrist Game
description: Wristwatch game based on the homonymous movie.

name: Caesar Palace Slots
description: Sin descripción

name: Caesars Palace Video Bonus Poker
description: Sin descripción

name: Running in the Y2K
description: Run, Jump and Hunt through procedurally generated levels to feed your family in the post-apocalyptic world of the year 2000 after the Y2K bug occurred. Compete against everyone in the leaderboards to show who is the best hunter in the new world.

name: Symmetry Lines
description: Simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines.

name: Stadtleben
description: Stadtleben is a strategic city building game in which you place gardens, streets and buildings on squares to create a big city. Here you should build as many or high skyscrapers as possible in order to be able to plant more tiles.

name: Melodier
description: Connect music note blocks and solve the puzzle to discover a popular melody in this good looking minimalist puzzle!

name: Adventure Trip: London - Collector's Edition
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: M87
description: An computer's artificial intelligence (AI) becomes the dominant form of intelligence on Earth, as computer programs and robots effectively take the control of the planet away from the human species. M87 is ex special force marine, and he is the only on in this world who can take this world back

name: Space Survival
description: This is a post-apocalyptic survival game that combines tower defense, survival, strategy, and random events. The game atmosphere is fun, and there are many wonderful props waiting for you to discover. Every decision you make will affect subsequent development. Live by your wisdom,

name: Digerati Presents: If You Don't Have Xbox Game Pass Bundle
description: A trio of Game Pass approved titles, available in one convenient collection - no Xbox Game Pass required! This bundle contains Signs of the Sojourner, The Procession to Calvary, and Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition.

name: Wingspan + European Expansion
description: Immerse yourself in a relaxing, serene world of unusual birds from two continents and expand your wildlife preserves.

name: Duel Jousting VR
description: Duel Jousting VR - Fast paced Dragon Jousting in multiple maps and game modes. Use an arsenal of up to 7 weapons to crush your enemies. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Dragon Jouster in VR?

name: Khoros
description: Khoros is a Sokoban puzzle style game set on the graceful scenario of the greek theater, take Ere to the glory performing the most claimed plays. ¡Bring togheter a powerfull cast and rise against the top critics of that time!

name: Planetary Planter
description: Planetary Planter is an open-world farming game where, instead of farming normal plants, you grow celestial bodies while exploring an alien world.

name: The Backrooms VR
description: Live the true Backrooms VR Experience in a psychological horror game, where you'll be alone in a liminal world full of entities that will hunt you at every moment, Scary, dark this immersive VR experience allows you to use your hands to grab and use items to solve puzzles inside this liminal world.

name: Delivery in Space
description: Delivery in Space is a relaxing puzzle game where you'll travel across the galaxy making deliveries to different planets. Black Hole, Nebula, Solar Storm and other wonders of outer space won't stop you on this journey! Prepare your spaceship and navigate using a card-based movement system.

name: Reaper of Immortals
description: Reaper of Immortals is a 2D pixel-art adventure game that tells the story of a lost reaper who is seeking his true purpose. Fight your way through countless enemies, reap everything that stands in your way, and find out the ultimate truth.

name: The Golden Eyed Ghosts
description: The Golden Eyed Ghosts is a dark fantasy soulslike heavily influenced by the legacy of Zelda adventures, set in the crumbling kingdom of Andromeda. As exiled warrior Orion, search for a way to restore his memories and unravel a terrifying conspiracy.

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Imperial Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Rowfall
description: Skillfully arrange falling rows of colored stones so that at least 3 of the same color touch and explode in breathtaking effects. Move all stones simultaneously to create new combinations and master random events that will change the game experience. Enjoy Rowfall!

name: Time to Hunt
description: Here you could not only experience thrilling combat on land, but also on the sea within one match. Engage in sea battles between medieval ships, feel the confrontation between cold weapons and firearms. Fight or hide，Law of the Jungle or win-win...... to survive to be the last one standing.

name: Roll Player
description: In Roll Player your goal is to create the best role playing character. Roll and draft dice to build up your character’s attributes. Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero. Train to gain skills and discover your hero’s traits to prepare them for their journey.

name: There Swings a Skull: Grim Tidings
description: Enter the doomed town of Pareildas. Watch as the flames turn bone and stone to ash. Like joined wicks, we'll all burn together.

name: Escape from Rowei
description: Strategic puzzle, your every choice will be decisive to save Leycla or not!

name: Camellia Train
description: Sin descripción

name: Eloquent Countenance
description: Eloquent Countenance is a short 2.5D RPG Maker horror/narrative-driven game with visual novel/adventure elements following the story of a nun who was selected by the church to assist in progressing the pastor's funeral service suddenly hearing a strange voice who claims to be a "guardian angel".

name: Grandpa's Cheese
description: Grandpa has gone mad! collect the cheese and give them to Reeze so he can feed his mouse to get the hell out of the house!

name: Dadi
description:
The cube has to reach the goal, but this is only possible if the gate is active.

So it’s push, connect, disconnect - and above all: act tactically wise. The functions of DADI are simple, but the puzzles will make your brain sweat.

From level to level, the puzzle worlds become more complicated, the challenge gets bigger, and often there is not just one correct solution.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: Port of the Game & Watch version of Donkey Kong Jr. for the Table Top series. It was later repackaged and sold by Coleco.

name: Donkey Kong Junior
description: A cancelled Coleco Tabletop port of the arcade game Donkey Kong Junior. After announcing, Coleco decide to port the Game & Watch version of the game instead.

name: Doterminism
description:
This beautiful minimalistic 'dutch design' game with a stunning soundtrack is a mix of art and puzzles.

The black and white dots got separated and you can reunite them.

Remove parts of the artwork, of specific colors, and try not to get stuck!

The zen mode is a way to relax, unwind the mind.

If you feel like a challenge though, choose the hard mode, and every decision will have a consequence!

Choose your own color palette to suite your style and reunite the black and white. Every level is handmade and designed.

name: Mario 4: Kosmichyeskaya Odissyeya
description: Mario 4: A Space Odyssey is a bootleg game based on the Mario series made for the Sega Genesis.

name: TankTrouble Classic
description:
TankTrouble Classic is the iconic arcade-style tank game, where you drive in a maze and shoot a variety of wall-bouncing projectiles at your enemites.

In singleplayer mode, TankTrouble Classic pits you against Laika, a fierce cyborg dog that's sure to challenge your skills.
You can also challenge a friend or two in local multiplayer warfare!

name: A Hell of a Journey
description: Experience a great journey with famous poet Dante and his super "reliable" narrator Virgil.

name: Endless Ruin Chapter I: Toward the Endless Ruin
description:
This game was made utilizing the principles of hypnowave. Changes in consciousness may occur when playing or listening.

An interactive music video.

name: Jump Runner
description:
Jump Runner is an unreleased game developed by Glass Ghost for Kuju Entertainment. It was aimed specifically for the Dreamcast Platform, announced in 1999 as a sci-fi action-adventure game.

Not only was Jump Runner to feature a single-player campaign but an online component was planned as well. The online mode was to offer a persistent online world where players would join gangs of criminals and fight for dominance.

name: Back to the Dawn
description: An exciting RPG set in a maximum-security prison populated by animals of every shape and size. Survive, explore, and escape! Along the way, you’ll interact with a motley crew of interesting and unique characters. Be strong and be smart! It's not just yourself you're saving, it's the whole city!

name: Lust in Terror Manor
description:
Thirteen men and women trapped in a Western hotel on an island. You are roped into a cruel game.

Trapped on a land full of strangers. In this situation filled with distrust, the one who appeared in front of you was—

Why do you know me!? In this dangerous situation, you share a secret with the handsome man that wants to protect you. Trapped in an inescapable room, will you be able to live on with him—?!?

name: Princess of the Moon Ultimate
description:
Welcome, Princess of the Moon.

You arrived at a negotiation in a foreign country with remnants of the Middle Ages. Night has fallen by the time the negotiations end, and you wander into a palace as you follow the moon home... Suddenly, chosen by the Princess of the Moon, you are to choose the next King that will lead the three kingdoms--!?

Before the fated day, you are to live together with the prince for 3 months and take lessons to become a true princess. Furthermore, you have to perform a secret role to the princes on a night with a full moon...?!

Which prince are you going to choose?

name: Idle War Camp
description: The battles have begun! Start training your troops for war... while getting rich!

name: NecroMerger
description:
The Devourer is always hungry and it’s your job to feed it in this idle merge game mashup. Play as the NecroMerger and use dark magic to summon an array of creatures (skeletons, zombies, demons, banshees… the list goes on). Merge them from piddly little grunts into massive (and tasty) brutes, before feeding them to your ever hungry pet.
As you grow your Devourer you’ll attract the attention of merchants, champions and even rivals. Some can be useful, others must be fought… or fed to your insatiable pet. The bigger the Devourer grows the more your lair will expand and you’ll unlock powerful abilities and spells.

name: Super Alloy Ranger
description: Super Alloy Ranger is a 2D side-scrolling action game. Play as Marksman Kelly or Combat Robot No.2 to challenge different levels within the dangerous Machine Empire and unlock new weapons. Use Kelly’s shooting and No.2’s deathblows to defeat abnormal Machine Bosses!

name: Zenless Zone Zero
description: Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse, here to provide a thrilling combat experience. Build a squad of up to three and begin your assault with Basic and Special Attacks. Dodge and Parry to neutralize your opponents' counterattacks, and when they're Stunned, unleash a powerful combo of Chain Attacks to finish them off! Remember, different opponents have different traits, and it would be prudent to use their weaknesses to your advantage.

name: Grand Piano Keys
description: Worthy of a Standing Ovation! Grand Piano Keys’ beautifully lit, attention-grabbing cabinet and marquee, along with the fun, simple game play will have aspiring musicians flocking back time and again to beat their high scores! With the option of a 1-player solo or a 2-player duet, the competitive nature and player-paced play of Grand Piano Keys appeals to all ages.

name: Air Fryer Sim
description: Have you ever wanted to own a restaurant where you only use air fryers? How well can you manage 10 air fryers at once? Drag food from the boxes (on the right) into the air fryers. After half the cook time is done, shake the baskets by clicking the air fryers, and let them cook for the other half. Once finished, click again to serve. Can you keep up with the orders? Will you waste food? How many people can you serve?

name: Tonkachi Mario
description: Tonkachi Mario is a bootleg kaizo rom hack of Super Mario Bros. made with Tonkachi Editor, an unlicensed code editor for the Famicom. It is currently the earliest known rom hack of Super Mario Bros, alongside being the first hack of the kaizo genre, dating back to 1987.

name: Kids Station: Hello Kitty no Oshaberi Town
description: Hello Kitty no Oshaberi Town is a collection of 16 mini games where the players can learn about colors, numbers, sounds, animals, etc. The mini games go from paint a drawing, buy items at the market, clean the room, catch butterflies, set the clock time, etc. There are some 2 player mini-games as well.

name: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling
description: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling is a fandisc for Cupid Parasite.

name: Barbarium
description:
Barbarium is a free action platformer, set in a post-apocalyptic world, where the man with the fastest lasergun and the biggest sword is the king.
Travel across exotic enviroments, kicking ass and saving girls. Fight towering bosses, drink beer, and enjoy a casual chat with the locals!

name: Nil Admirari no Tenbin: Twin Pack
description: A bundled edition containing the original game (Teito Genwaku Kitan) and its sequel (Kuroyuri En'youtan).

name: Kids Station: Hello Kitty no Ouchi he Oide yo!
description: Hello Kitty no o-Uchi he o-Ide yo! is a collection of 30 mini-games where the players can learn about Kitty's house, cooking, painting, design clothes, play games in the park, play with Kitty's pet, etc.

name: Attack on Titan: A Choice with No Regrets
description: Attack on Titan: A Choice with No Regrets (Shingeki no Kyojin: Kui Naki Sentaku) is a visual novel released on Decmber 18th, 2013 in Japan and bundled with sixth anime Blu-ray.

name: Scripted Souls
description: The title granted to those who choose to bravely fight against the corroded ones were known as the scripters. As a scripter solve and use the power of words to control your monsters and defeat your enemy.

name: A Gladiator's Hell
description: A Gladiator's Hell is a Singleplayer 2D side scroller set in a rundown city name Outlinn You will play as a gladiator name "Gill" that is going thought the city "Hacking and Slashing" to reach is biggest enemy.

name: Blocked Zona
description: Blocked Zona is a 2D shooter in which you play as a special unit mercenary who has gone to an infested area infested with zombies in search of the R-327 military chip. The fate of the world is at stake. Arm yourself with the best military weapons and go into battle!

name: Slaughter Cannon 2
description: Slaughter Cannon - Continuation of the first part of an exciting physical puzzle! In the game you will find even more exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Incubus
description: Incubus is a 2D simulation game. Get help from Incubus and have sex with various women for 30 days.

name: Block Breaker 2
description: Block Breaker 2 - Sequel to an exciting puzzle game with many challenging levels and beautiful graphics.

name: Box Rush 2: Ice Worlds
description: An icy winter has come to the magical kingdom and ice monsters have invaded your kingdom. The little prince must once again take up arms and repulse the enemies. Take advantage of all the bonuses that were before and those that have appeared again!

name: Brave Survivor
description: Brave survivor - In this heart-pounding beat em up, you take on the role of a brave survivor whose fist punches a path to freedom through hordes of enemies. Beat bad guys mercilessly, collect bonuses and destroy bosses in this incredible game!

name: Long Journey
description: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts!

name: Rough Kuts: 3D
description: Rough Kuts: 3D is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies.

name: Raccoon Tales
description: Play as a raccoon in this stealth game where you steal, destroy and knock over trash cans in a variety of levels while eluding dangerous foes.

name: Bobbi Adventure
description: This is a kind dwarf Bobby, who travels through a fantasy world.

name: Lone Elven Wanderer
description: Lone Elven Wanderer is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. You have to go on an incredible adventure through different worlds in search of gold, jewels and fame.

name: Attack on Titan: Burning Bright in the Forests of the Night
description: Attack on Titan: Burning Bright in the Forests of the Night is a visual novel written by Gun Snark. It was released on December 18, 2013 in Japan and bundled with sixth anime Blu-ray.

name: Invasion Waves
description: Invasion Waves is 2D Pixelated Top-Down Shooter Game

name: Arcade Archives: Fighting Hawk
description: The Falcon joins the battle in the skies!

name: Shopping Clutter: The Best Playground
description: The Walker family is back with an all new puzzle adventure game. You know the Walkers from the Travel Mosaic series. This time, they are looking to create a perfect playground where children of all ages and their parents can spend quality time together. As it turns out, this will not be an easy task. Help the Walkers sort through mounds of clutter to find all the necessary equipment to finish the job.

name: The Lost Kingdom Prophecy
description: Restore the alliance between mortals and Elementals in The Lost Kingdom Prophecy, a mystical quest to save a fallen realm. It is said that as long as the Tree of Life is in bloom, peace will reign over the Kingdom of Rosefal, but this year, its flowers have stopped drifting in the wind. A banished wizard spreads corruption and fear, and only you can help.

name: Pizza Run
description: Pizza Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Pepperoni Pizza.

name: Rush
description:
Are you ready for a thrilling ride?
Rush through the void while dodging obstacles in this endless roller coaster ride. Think quick and tap to switch lanes in order to reach incredible speeds!

name: Dungeon of the Damned
description: If you are an old-school style adventure game lover, you can't miss this!

name: Attack on Titan: Lost in the Cruel World
description: Lost in the Cruel World is a visual novel by Hiroshi Seko. It was first released on September 18th, 2013 in Japan bundled with the third anime Blu-ray. The story was also included in the novel Attack on Titan: Lost Girls which was later adapted into a manga of the same name.

name: Attack on Titan: Wall Sina, Goodbye
description: Side story about Annie Leonhart that is included in the anime Blu-ray/DVD box vol. 6.

name: Barbie: Ocean Discovery
description:
The Game Boy Color version of Adventures with Barbie: Ocean Discovery.
The PC and GBC versions are slightly different; The dolphin plays a more significant role in Windows than it does in the Game Boy Color version.

name: Barbie Pet Rescue
description: In "Barbie: Pet Rescue" for Game Boy Color, Barbie must rescue stray animals after a thunderstorm hits Green Arbor Park. She uses vehicles to reach the animals, and some require mini-games to be completed before they can be rescued. Once the animals are back at the Rescue Center, Barbie must increase their health and happiness levels using different treatments. After the animals are healthy and happy, she returns them to their owners, sometimes by completing a final mini-game to match the animal with its parent. Each successful rescue earns Barbie a certificate, and progress is saved through passwords.

name: Barbie as the Princess and the Pauper
description: In her new adventure, Barbie takes on two roles--Erika and Princess Anneliese. Based on the classic story The Prince and the Pauper, this game follows Erika as she tries to prove that she's worthy to be crowned queen. With the help of Princess Anneliese, you must help Erika move through the game's unique environments and settings--the village, castle, and forest--so that she is fully prepared for the coronation ceremony and her role as queen. Showcase Erika's best qualities by helping villagers, solving puzzles, and completing creative tasks.

name: Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses
description: Barbie is cast as Genevieve, one of the twelve princesses who live with their windowed father King Randolph in a castle. They live a frivolous live, so Randolph brings over his cousin Duchess Rowena to raise them as proper princesses. She makes their lives miserable however and poisons the king, so they flee to a magical world brought to life through a story of their mother. Rowena traps them there, along with Genevieve's friend Derek, and they need to use a goblet to collect mystical water that can cure their father.

name: Barbie Fashion Show
description: Barbie Fashion Show lets you help Barbie get ready for Fashion Week in Paris! Advance through 3 design studios creating stylish outfits for Barbie and her four friends to model. It's up to you to put on the coolest, most fashionable fashion shows ever!

name: Barbie Mermaid Adventure
description:
In Barbie Mermaid Adventure, Barbie assumes the role of a specimen of that mythical fish-human hybrid, the mermaid, and plans a party with all of her undersea friends. Unfortunately, a magical light shell in the main palace broke. In order to fix it, Barbie needs to enlist the help of 3 rainbow dolphins.

Explore three exotic undersea worlds!; Play seven fun-filled games and activities!; Care for cuddlefish, free Whisper the whale, and more!; Collect decorations and hand out party invitations!; Help Mermaid Barbie and her friends compose the "Song of the Sea"!; Play two of a kind with school fish and watch them dance at the celebration and design a crown and necklace for Barbie to wear!

name: Barbie of Swan Lake: The Enchanted Forest
description: Play imaginative games to restore the forest to its grandeur as you journey to six magical locations! Search for hidden items within each world as you paint murals, create a field of singing flowers, piece together puzzles, and more.

name: Barbie: Treasures in Time
description: Barbie: Treasures in Time is a cancelled sequel to Barbie Explorer for the Nintendo GameCube and PlayStation 2. It was scheduled to be released in June 2nd, 2003.

name: Barbie Jewelry Designer
description: Barbie helps you design all kinds of jewelry that you can wear. Mix and match colors, patterns, and pretty designs. Print favorite designs on the Print 'n Shrink material using an ink-jet printer, then simply cut them out and bake them in an oven. They miraculously shrink into colorful plastic jewelry.

name: Barbie as Rapunzel
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie as Princess Bride
description: Barbie as Princess Bride introduces the player to a young Princess Barbie and her childhood friend, Prince Ken. The 2 grow up close together, fully intending to wed the day they come of age. One day, Prince Ken is called out to sea on a long journey but promises the princess that he will return to marry her one day.

name: Barbie Beauty Styler
description: Barbie Beauty Styler is a creative painting / drawing package featuring Barbie and her friends Teresa, Kira and Christie. It is aimed at the younger gamer. There is very little writing, all the icons 'speak' to identify themselves as the mouse passes over them and the game regularly chips in with encouraging comments like 'You're really good at this' and 'Isn't this fun!'.

name: Barbie Magic Genie Bottle
description:
Barbie Magic Genie Bottle is a computer game that is packaged with a custom-purpose input peripheral -- an actual genie bottle that attaches to a Windows PC via a standard PC 15-pin joystick port. The bottle is used to invoke special actions during the game and is thus a required component of the gameplay.

Barbie transports the player to the distant land where you will be assisting her. Barbie needs the player to visit 5 different lands and collect 5 different gems. In order to collect the gem in each land, the player must solve a puzzle. Solving the puzzle requires collecting 5 puzzle pieces scattered about the land.

Gameplay involves navigating through a first-person 3D city on foot and via flying carpet, which raises the player up to a higher plane. All the while, Barbie is in tow lending advice. Throughout different cities, the player also has to interact with other people and complete sub-quests that they assign in order to advance the game.

name: Totally Tattoos
description: Sin descripción

name: Digital Makeover
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie as Sleeping Beauty
description: Barbie as Sleeping Beauty tells the story of Princess Rose, who was gifted with beauty, laughter and love by good fairies, but cursed by an evil fairy to fall asleep for one hundred years before her 16th birthday. Help Princess Rose get ready for her 16th birthday party, wake up her animal friends, design a crown and dress to wear to the party, and find the hidden fairies in the library to get the key to the banquet hall.

name: Barbie Photo Designer
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie Nail Designer
description: Design personalized nail stickers you can really wear. Join Barbie at her fabulous nail salon and choose a style to match your own--Daisy Days, Cool Styles, or Glossy Glam. Choose from an array of colors and animated designs, from pinks and reds, blues and greens, to rainbows and fun jungle prints. You can even create your own special nail designs. Then add sparkles and other finishing touches for the ultimate digital manicure. Now print the nails you have designed on special sticker sheets included--and wear your nails for instant fingernail fun!

name: Will o' Wisp
description: Will O' Wisp is an otome game, developed and published by Otomate, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: You Don't Know Jack: Censored
description: Sin descripción

name: Ys: Memories of Celceta - Timeless Adventurer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dome Keeper
description: Dome Romantik has grown to become Dome Keeper with beautiful updated pixel art, atmospheric music and sound and more of everything. Defend your dome from wave after wave of hostile attacks in this roguelike survival miner. Use the time between each attack to dig beneath the surface in search of valuable resources. Use them carefully on powerful upgrades to help you stay alive and make it to the next world.

name: Boo!
description: Exciting missions and crazy shootout with numerous and interesting opponents. Assembling abilities will allow you to complete tasks in a variety of ways. Collect and combine upgrades to suit your playstyle. Make your way to the end of the story to find out the secret and save humanity from monsters.

name: Polar Penguin Post
description: Penguin Delivery Service!! Run a logistics company in Winter Mountain, the land of snow! Place the items in the bag so that the penguins can deliver them safely. Do people's favors and gain trust. You can help the Pola Penguin Post settle and penguins become recognized as residents.

name: SenS
description: In the Beginning was the Nothingness... Enter the Unknown, explore the Infinite, find your own SenS.

name: A Shot in the Dark
description: A Shot in the Dark is a choice-driven adult visual novel about new possibilities and dark secrets.

name: No One Survived
description: This is a multiplayer cooperative open world construction survival sandbox game, where you and your friends must find supplies and build shelters in this world. You have to keep an eye on your character's needs state at all times, a bad state is likely to lead to death.

name: Picture Builder
description: Innovative art puzzle. Build pixel pictures from blocks by stacking them on top of each other.

name: Dreamin' Her: Boku ha, Kanojo no Yume wo Miru
description: From the creators of Seven Days and Lost:Smile, Life0 presents their third game: "Dreamin' Her". In his dreams, the ideal girlfriend appears taking the form of his childhood friend. Is she really just a dream, or is she something more?

name: Deios I: Director's Cut
description: Deios I is an arena shooter set in a surreal pixel art landscape. Players traverse through strange areas, challenging a series of arenas. Set in an alternative Internet world. The players uncover a mystery of what is the Deios BBS system invented by a strange interfaith cyber author. Themes of God.

name: Rough Sea
description: A vast open world Sail to the vast open world, explore uninhabited islands and defeat unknown enemies. Trade between islands, or become pirates to plunder During the game journey, you can collect materials to establish your own camp, and use materials to build ships to dominate the sea

name: Palmas
description: Pick up a weapon, use your ability, shoot down your friend~but be careful! you might mess yourself up by opening the box.

name: Nazi Furry
description: Nazi Furry will wonder you with animations of hot unusual characters after every successfully passed level. You need to show up your logic in interesting puzzle game to enjoy everything what furry girls prepared for you!

name: Kitabashers United
description: Bad Dudes are attacking Kitty City. Team Kitty has United to Bash the Bad Dudes. "Kitabashers United" is a fantastic 'JRPG inspired' game with a turn-based combat system.

name: Squarely Blue
description: A minimalist puzzle game in which you try to make your way through each level by finding a path on a grid of tiles that disappear as soon as you leave them.

name: Dune Mechanic: Survive the Steampunk Era
description: Create weapons of your dreams from gunpowder pistols to grenade launchers. Craft cartridges by mixing powder ingredients. Melt ore, blow glass, study chemistry, and make explosives. Cut, mine, dig, shoot, build, research, design, craft, explore and more in the Dune deserts!

name: Sakura Blossom
description: Do your best to protect Sakura as she grows stronger!

name: Jambo! Safari: Animal Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Gran Premio
description: A fast paced online multiplayer car racing game!

name: Mist
description:
Collect NFTs, battle epic monsters, and explore infinite immersive environments in this blockchain-based NFT Action RPG built on the Mist NFT Framework.
The game universe connects to the MIST native token as the in-game currency, allowing you to farm and stake tokens to earn in- and out- of game rewards.

name: Paper Bride 2: Zangling Village
description: This is the sequel to our Paper Bride series based on Chinese folklore. This story takes place in Zangling Village, where players must explore a village shrouded in occult mystery to uncover the secret origins of this haunted village.

name: Happy Pets
description: Happy Pets was a facebook game in which you have to take care of various pets, buying them food, playing with them, walking them, and customizing them to your liking. It was developed by Crowdstar but later taken over by 101XP It was shutdown 11 Months after Flash ended

name: The Princess of the Tower wants a Hero
description: Princess Lumi has been held captive in the demon lord’s castle situated in a land of everlasting winter. She hates it. It’s cold, it’s lonely, the food is bad, and there’s literally nothing to do! The only good thing about this place is the tea and snacks.

name: Solraid
description: SOLRAID is a single player top-down spaceship shooter.

name: Brazzers: The Game
description:
Welcome to the steamy world of the Brazzers studio in this truly revolutionary online sex game! Slip into the role of a true porn producer and reach new levels of naughty stardom by working with the best in the industry!

Get famous Brazzers talent such as Abella Danger and Phoenix Marie to work with you and cast them in the raunchiest videos you can think of! And since your girls deserve the best of the best when it comes to pleasure, legendary stars such as Johnny Sins or Keiran Lee, are locked and loaded and just waiting for you to say the word! So, welcome to the team! Can you handle the heat?

name: 01's Blackhole
description: 01's Blackhole is a singleplayer 2D top-down bullet-hell RPG about Jack getting sucked into a blackhole and has to find his way back home and stop who is creating the blackholes.

name: PewDiePie's Paradise Island
description:
Survive on this paradise island and wait for the chopper!

Game done in 72 hours for indies vs pewdiepie game jam.

name: Bear Surfin Mega Wave
description:
A short difficult fast paced crazy weird arcade game with hectic graphics. You are 'Bear' surfing a Mega Wave.

Use the mouse to maneuver Bear around obstacles. Try to get crates and health packs. When the counter reaches zero you win.

name: The Call of Krul'ar
description:
Survive the horrors of the unknown as you expand out to keep from being dragged into the darkness; and devoured by that which lurks inside.

Collect, Combine, Defend, and Expand using the various cards you find in this land.

name: Kids Station: Hello Kitty to Album Nikki wo Tsukurimasho!
description: In Hello Kitty to Album Nikki wo Tsukurimasho! The player will travel with Hello Kitty to different countries around the world and play different mini-games.

name: Kids Station: Hitori de Dekirumon!
description:
Hitori de Dekirumon! is based on a Japanese TV Show for kids about showing kids how to cook.
The game lets the player learn about meals and cooking, and features different mini-games.

name: Kids Station: Kikansha Thomas to Nakama-tachi
description: Kikansha Thomas to Nakama-tachi is a collection of mini-games based on Thomas the Tank Engine.

name: Banjo-Threeie
description:
Banjo-Threeie is a rumored third entry for the Banjo-Kazooie series that was supposedly intended to be made for the Nintendo GameCube in the early 2000s.

The game was first hinted at the end of Banjo-Tooie, in which the character Gruntilda jokingly says "Just you wait until Banjo-Threeie...", which was speculated to be evidence that the game was at one point planned by fans.

At SpaceWorld 2000, a small animation featuring characters from the Banjo-Kazooie series was shown, showing off the presence of Rare during the GameCube era of gaming. The animation features Banjo, Kazooie and Mumbo Jumbo being chased by enemies from Banjo-Tooie, all using their models from the game.

In 2002, Rare was brought by Microsoft, which caused various games developed for Nintendo systems at the time to move platforms, which would've included Banjo-Threeie.

Decades later, in 2020, the developer Gregg Mayles confirmed it to be simply a joke that fans took at face value, and the SpaceWorld demo was confirmed to simply be a showcase of how many N64 models the GameCube could render at once.

According to Mayles, a game in the same style as the first two wasn't in the plans, and they went through three different concepts, until setting on what became Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts.

name: How to Live a Healthy Hentai Lifestyle!
description:
Gotou Hajime has enrolled in Penile University, majoring in perversion in order to study and deepen his understanding of the art and eventually carry out research on the subject.

Due to Hajime’s chosen field of study, he has registered to live with the Maezono family – a family whose mother is the legendary pervert that prevented World War 3 with her sexual diplomacy!

name: Ari In Wonderland: Episode 1
description: Ari after a long day falls fast asleep and goes back into wonderland. She has no idea why she is back. A lot has changed and the more she thinks about her past it gets more and more blurry. Ari meets some friends on the way to help her find what she wants and to restore wonderland, discover Ari's past along with her.

name: Neko Secret: Homecoming
description: When you were traveling around the world, someone told you about an anime factory located in some Neko Town. Now this is your way. Perhaps the anime begins here. Is this your place?

name: Warframe: Vor's Revenge
description:
In Warframe: Vor's Revenge you get the following additions:
- "Nova". Hunt the "Raptor" on Europa if it is Nova you seek...
- Orokin Void Map expansion (with Mobile Defense, Defense, and Capture!) with 5 new Prime weapons to be found (Bronco, Fang, Paris, Braton, Orthos)
- Captain Vor Boss Battle (drops rare "Seer" scoped pistol blueprints)
- New Sentinel Attachments - Jet Wings, Koi tail, Mechhead mask
- Dojo Statues have Arrived! Explore 12 new placeable decorations for your dojo (Plus, coming soon, +2 more decos for top ranked clans from Fusion MOA and Snipetron event)
- New Weapons

name: Reaction Quake 3
description:
The idea is that each bullet counts for a lot, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't pump them full of as many bullets as you can spare; they'll get a chance to shoot back before they die if you don't finish them off. Cover actually means something, it's better to make sure there's a pillar or a desk near by to duck behind, especially if you have to reload or bandage yourself.
Combine that with the ability to strafe, ramp, ladder, and double jump and you've got yourself one hell of a good time.

name: Riders World: I Want to Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Riders World: I Want to Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Miss Clue: Formula for Danger
description:
Jane's summer vacation is interrupted when she arrives at the lodge of her Aunt and Uncle, and finds out about a mysterious formula.
Her friend is plunged into a difficult situation, and needs the help of Jane Darcy to get to the bottom of the mystery! Will you be able to find the hidden formula, before it's too late?
Unravel a web of secrets and put your sleuthing skills to the test, as you take on the risky mystery of Formula for Danger!

name: Kids Station: Kuma no Pooh-san - Mori no Nakama to 123
description: Kids Station: Kuma no Pooh-san - Mori no Nakamato 123 is a collection of mini-games hosted by Winnie-the-Pooh.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Crusaders
description: Warhammer: Dark Crusaders is a cancelled FPS that was in development for PC by Mindscape in 1995 / 1996. Dark Crusaders was going to be one of the few first person shooters based on the Warhammer world, but the gameplay was not that much fun and in the end Mindscape decided to never publish the game, even though it was almost complete. The game was however later released onto the internet and is for the most part playable. It seems that the FMV sequences used in Warhammer: Dark Crusaders were later recycled for Warhammer: Final Liberation, a turn-based tactics game published for Windows in 1997.

name: TKKG: Deadly Chocolate
description: TKKG is a point and click adventure game following four students solving a crime.

name: Warframe: Shadows of the Dead
description:
ADDITIONS
- New Warframe: Nekros
- New Prime Warframe: Mag
- Survival Missions Return!
- Survival now takes place in procedurally generated levels, allowing greater mission variety, challenge, and replayability.
- Weekly leaderboards are now live for all survival missions on the Starchart!
- All Raid Void Keys have been retroactively replaced with Survival missions.
- A handful of our new mods can be found by playing Survival missions, good luck!
- The Conclave
- New Level Sets: Orokin Derelict Spacecrafts.
- New Sentinels!
- New boss: Infested Golem
- Level Expansion - Grineer Settlement
- New Weapons!
- New Clan weapons!
- New Prime Weapons in the Void!
- New Mods!
- New Customization Options:
- Clan Dojo Level update/props:
- All Grineer now speak "Grineer", a language capable of communicating their barbaric ways!

name: Growing My Grandpa!
description: Growing My Grandpa! is a narrative-driven point-and-click horror game with virtual pet elements.

name: Susume! Kaizoku: Be Pirates!
description: Susume Kaizoku: Be Pirates! is a pirate-themed adventure game featuring ship-to-ship combat.

name: Wild Wolf Simulator 3D
description:
Have you ever imagined being wild Wolf? Now you can play as real wild Wolf and become the most powerful animal in the wilderness.
Be a wild Wolf and survive in the wildness as long as you can. Start your own pride of wolves, fight for your life against fierce animals like moose, bear and fox. Evolve your Wolf to become the strongest Wolf ever.

name: Yeardle
description: Yeardle is a "Wordle clone" focused on identifying the specific year of three random historical events. Players have eight tries to find the right answer, and previous guesses will change color depending on how close the correct year is.

name: Friday Night Funkin': V.S. Father Foundest
description: Boyfriend and Girlfriend visit America's greatest national monument- Father Foundest - for presidents day!

name: A Floof's Adventure
description: The giant currant tree has been giving fewer fruits over time, your duty is to, at least, bring back some edible currants to your village...

name: Air Hockey
description: Air Hockey is a game for the Sega Genesis created by Devworks Game Technology. It's commonly included as a pre-installed game in the AtGames Sega Genesis Flashback systems.

name: Sinister Night
description: Sinister Night is a multiplayer, social deduction horror game combined with betrayal. Eight streamers came to an abandoned Gnostic school where a terrible murder happened, yet two of them have been possessed by the Corrupter. Once the Scarlet Dream started and piercing screams split the air, one player was lying in their own blood. Hidden under the Ghost, is it Satan incarnate or a wicked witch? Wraiths that died miserably are still wandering around in this school. They will tell you exactly what happened here. Find the Offering that stops the evil rituals, or execute the Corrupters hidden among you. Save your life from your destiny as the "Last Supper."

name: Gurk III: the 8-bit RPG
description: The long-awaited sequel to the also-long-awaited sequel to the beloved 8-bit RPG has finally arrived! The third installment in the series is a bigger adventure than ever before, with loads of new monsters and items, many with unique effects and abilities. Character classes are better-differentiated and combat tactics are more subtle and interesting without sacrificing the hack'n'slash ethos that Gurk fans adore. The dedication to 8-bit culture remains fervent, with the complete 20-song soundtrack rendered with analog synth emulators that will evoke the classic sounds of the game systems of the 1980s. It's all enough to justify the outrageously steep $2 price tag, so pay up and get Gurkin'!

name: Adibou
description: Abidou is an educational game for kids between 4 and 7 years old.

name: Quake II: Colossus
description: Sin descripción

name: Wicked Surfing
description: Sin descripción

name: The History Channel: The Civil War Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Wars: Lethal Alliance
description: To capture the plans for the Death Star and make it back home safely, players must guide Rianna Saren and her trusty droid Zeeo through a variety of Star Wars environments while avoiding or attacking Imperial soldiers and their allies. Rianna is gifted in combat and Zeeo comes in handy for unlocking security doors, reaching high places, and bypassing dangerous areas. The story of Star Wars: Lethal Alliance unfolds between Episode III and Episode IV, when Princess Leia recruits the duo to steal the plans so the Rebels may learn any weaknesses in the massive weapon. Players will explore such areas as Tatooine, Despayre, Alderaan, and Danuta while interacting with characters including Boba Fett, Darth Vader, and Kyle Katarn. The PSP features various mini-games and multiplayer Twil'lek vs. Twi'lek combat over a wireless network.

name: Arc Style: Happy Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Slaycation Paradise
description: Are you tired of the same boring old vacations? Then boy have we got the tonic for you! Slaycation Paradise offers the ultimate in multi-dimensional apocalyptic tours. Slay away your worries with Twin-Stick action mixed with Tower Defence as you visit the end-of-world scenarios of your dreams!

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Super Edition
description:
Dragon Ball FighterZ Super Edition includes:
• Goku (Ultra instinct)
• Kefla
• Broly (DBS)
• Gogeta (SSGSS)
• Jiren
• Zamasu (Fused)
• Vegito (SSGSS)
• Goku (SSGSS) and Vegeta (SSGSS) early unlock
• For each of these characters, you will receive 5 costume colors, a lobby avatar and Z stamp

name: Tekken 7: Legendary Edition
description: This version contains the base game plus 7 DLC fighters.

name: Baldo: The Guardian Owls - The Three Fairies Edition
description: Action, adventure, dungeons... Dive into a thrilling odyssey!

name: Mortal Kombat 4
description: Mortal Kombat 4 is 1 vs 1 fighting game, similar to the other Mortal Kombat games, but this is first game in series with 3D characters models. The player can choose from 15 different fighters at the start (and several unlockables later on). Many fighters from earlier games in the series make a comeback (like Scorpion, Sub Zero, Liu Kang, Sonya Blade, Johnny Cage etc.) while other new fighters join in, like Shinook (who is the main evil character in this game), Fujin, Jarek, and Kai. Goro returns as a boss.

name: Academy34
description: In Academy34 you are going to take on a role of a cadet, who has just enrolled to the Academy, where young recruits are trained to become Overwatch agents. An exciting student life awaits you with all familiar characters, original story, lots of side quests and tons of adult content!

name: Space Chimps
description: Space Chimps is based off of the 2008 movie with the same name.

name: Battlebots
description: A cancelled video game based off of the Comedy Central series "Battlebots" that ran from 2000 to 2002. Featuring over 40 robots from the TV series in 4 different weight classes, as well as a custom bot builder for use in a tournament mode. The game was developed by Warthog and was to be published by THQ, but the game was cancelled late in development due to the cancellation of the TV series it was based on.

name: Iron Man
description:
Iron Man is a 2008 video game based on the film of the same name as well as the classic iterations of the character. It was released on May 2, 2008 to coincide with the release of the film in cinemas.

The enemies are Advanced Idea Mechanics, the Maggia and the Ten Rings terrorist group. The supervillains in the game includes Blacklash, Controller, Titanium Man, Melter, and Iron Monger.

A significant feature has Robert Downey, Jr., Terrence Howard and Shaun Toub reprising their roles from the film.

name: Arthur and the Invisibles
description:
Directly inspired by world famous film director and writer Luc Besson's upcoming animated film of the same name, the Arthur and the Minimoys game will follow the film's storyline and feature eye-popping graphics and technical innovations.

By taking a very unique approach to its presentation of the Arthur universe and utilising the unique features of the DS hardware, the Nintendo DS version of Arthur and the Minimoys is a different kind of game to the versions for other consoles and PC. Arthur and the Minimoys for DS gleefully portrays the magical world of Arthur through a series of original and entertaining micro games and with an absorbing 'virtual pet simulator' where players are responsible for caring for and breeding 'Mul mull', small, fluffy, flying creatures found in abundance in the world of Arthur.

name: Endrr
description: Survive the hordes of monsters as long as you can. Fight, upgrade your skills, loot equipments, die, rince and repeat.

name: Harvest Moon: One World - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Forza Horizon 5: Expansions Bundle
description: The Forza Horizon 5 Expansions Bundle includes two expansions. Each expansion will introduce a new location, vehicles, and gameplay.

name: Fern Flower
description: A short visual novel inspired by Slavic mythology set in a present world where monotheistic religions never existed and everyone still worships the old gods. Two romantic options are present and the game includes a glossary of terms.

name: Medievalfield
description: Medievalfield is a thrilling mobile action shooter with elements of strategy.

name: GraviT
description:
Are you ready for a new kind of puzzle game?

Simply rotate puzzles left or right until each colored block comes to rest in a matching outline color. It can't be THAT hard can it?

name: Intern: An Intern's Guide to Maintaining Internal Rage
description:
Welcome to your first day at *redacted*! This new employee guide comes to you directly from the Far Corner Devs.

We here at *redacted* thank you for joining our family. You may have heard people refer to this job as: monotonous, passion devouring or a complete waste of shareholder funds.

name: MugenCards
description: Play MugenCards, an endless card game!

name: My Name is Mayo 3
description: Get ready to have your intellect enriched, your emotions manipulated and your mayonnaise expanded; as you unveil the stories and learn from mistakes. Our lives are too short not to be enhanced with meaningful stories like this one!

name: Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Investigator
description: Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Investigator is a 2.5D first-person adventure mystery game where you play as an investigator who solves cases by taking pictures of cryptids, urban legends, & mythological creatures as well as befriending them in an open-world environment

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 4
description: Mystical Legends 4 is a fascinating puzzle game. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of mystery, mystery and mysticism. Don't be afraid to immerse yourself in a magical and mystical world, 500 mosaic pictures will help you to do so.

name: Volvalis
description: Experience a dark, epic RPG mystery laden with multi-faceted characters and dangerous secrets! Unfolding with a soundtrack carefully implemented for maximum storytelling and emotional impact, the lost land Volvalis beckons the intrepid....

name: Waste
description: Waste is a pseudo 3D RPG where you take on the role of a Dustbin/Garbage man, collecting Waste from the houses of the street you are working on, avoiding obstacles like cars, bikes, dogs.. If your customer is happy, they will invite you inside to play on their new computer or ask other favors.

name: Ahmes
description: In Ancient Egypt, Ahmes and his little brother Akil are orphans and live a simple life. Until one day, the Royal Guards come and attack their village. Akil is thrown into the Nil river. Ahmes rushes to save his brother, but a giant hand emerges from the water and carries Akil into the darkness of the Nil. Ahmes then enters the Underworld in order to save his little brother.

name: Masks of Deception
description: Masks of Deception is a 6 player multiplayer game where you must work together to find and expel a demon. However, correctly identifying the monster will be difficult as one of you has been possessed and turned against the rest. Use your senses and investigative tools to gather the information required to send this hellish creature back to the depths from whence it came, all while avoiding the fatal wretched beings that stalk these haunted lands. Note that one chance is all you get, and any mistake can lead to utter failure.

name: Aeolwyn's Legacy
description: Aeolwyn’s Legacy is a new first-person party-based RPG for the PC. It’s an epic tale in a sprawling world filled with knights, kings, allies and betrayal.

name: Adonis
description:
Adonis, a story about love and death...

Incarnate Adonis, the spirit of a familiar who was separated from his witch when they died. He will then try to save the soul of his former mistress by going to appease her, suffering from an endless mourning...

name: Skull Maze: Tiny Roguelike
description: Skull Maze was a very simple roguelike where you have to run through levels collecting coins while avoiding enemies

name: Thirty Cycles
description:
A game made for Nemesis Jam.
Control one of the nine knights and fight to become the greatest.

Video game mechanics should not be patented.

Inspired by a recently patented Nemesis system from Shadow of Mordor and Shadow of War games.

name: Hyper Mari World 6
description: Hyper Mari World 6 is a ROM hack created by Haimari known for having brutal difficulty.

name: Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends
description: Get ready to rage with your friends in this co-op precise platforming adventure! You're stuck in Hell. You can only jump upwards and all you have to do is escape … it can't be that hard, right?!

name: Star Hearts: Launch Point
description: Star Hearts: Launch Point is a tight 2D action adventure featuring an 8-bit retro aesthetic in classic NES-fashion. Journey to the galaxy’s edge and discover the origins of Prin - an interstellar revolutionary in the making - as she embarks upon her first space-faring adventure!

name: Me and the Zombies
description: Me and the Zombies is a shooter game. You’ll find weapons and ammunition you’ll need to fight your way against the zombies. You’re in a remote place and the only way out is through a tunnel. Find it!

name: Hayai
description: You are Ronin. Survive against an onslaught of enemies using a unique, mouse-based combat system. Draw your attack, felling your enemies in one swoop!

name: Spacemancer
description: You will peek, manipulate and travel through the chaos dimensions in search of energy stabilizers to fix the messed up world.

name: Peace Maker VR
description: Peace Maker VR is a game in a fantasy world where you defend a village with guns and magic.

name: Trade Sails
description: Ever wanted to deliver cargos amongst the islands that waiting you to discover! In Trade Sails, you will sail for the delivery of cargos, while a shadow is waiting for you at the sea.

name: Chromatic
description: Chromatic is a 2D Side-Scroller where your goal is to bring color into a monochrome world by using your abilities to traverse new terrain and defeat enemies.

name: Spotted
description: Spotted is a mouse maze game, requiring agility and bravery. Travel along the river, being careful to only touch the water and not the riverbank. The more water you accumulate, the higher your score. As you progress, the pace will get faster, so try your best to keep up.

name: The Adventures of Detective Bron
description: The Adventures of Detective Bron is a detective-adventure game in which you have to investigate all kinds of crimes: from murders and missing people to robberies. Solve all the mysteries and test your deductive skills!

name: Heroes War
description: Sin descripción

name: My Colony 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Burger
description:
Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: House Flipper: Farm
description:
Experience fresh farm vibes, thanks to the latest addition to the House Flipper family.
Let your surroundings be filled with the sounds of the life of your animal companions!
Build homesteads and look after swine, sheep, chickens, and more!
Your very own farming adventure begins now!

Hungry? It's thyme for dinner! Lettuce celebrate!
No matter what you plant, you better take care of creating the right conditions for your vegetation!
A selection of unique tools and a set of farming skills will help you with that!
Prepare the soil, spare no water, and you shall be harvesting plentiful crops in a blink of an eye!

Keeping your farm in check is not just a responsibility, but also a pleasure!
Whistle for your favorite steed, hop in the saddle, and go for a ride around your land.
Keep in mind that this is just the beginning of your adventure, farmer.
Maplebloom Village awaits you!

name: Get to the Top 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimlight
description: Awaken to a new beginning in a world of dreams and fairy tales.

name: Infectonator
description: Have zombies? Will travel! Take over the globe with a tap of your finger in this addictive arcade game of world domination with retro pixel graphics.

name: Idle Zombie Shelter
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Sangokushi
description: Sin descripción

name: Anima of Quantmix
description: Sin descripción

name: Nora's Dream
description:
Solve puzzles to help her escape

Nora finds herself in mysterious, but strangely familiar place inhabited by creatures that seem to know her. She has no recollection of how she got there. Can you help her find a way back?

name: Tank Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Chromatic Souls
description: Sin descripción

name: Right Swipes: Blast Date
description: Sin descripción

name: SoulWorker: Anime Legends
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Nightmare: Shrine
description: Endless Nightmare: Shrine is a free 3D horror game, and it's the third entry of the Endless Nightmare series. Different from the previous two horror games, scary shrine owns a bigger map, and more types of technology weapons. In this horror game, action and shooting is still a feature. In addition to long-range shooting, you can also fight against creepy monsters in close quarters; the ultimate battle with bosses enriches the fun of the horror shooting game; new survival skills have also been added to the epic game, which greatly improves the chances of survival! Exquisite 3D art style, well-designed puzzles, terrifying unknown monsters, fierce fighting in the creepy rooms, satisfy all your fantasy of creepy horror games! Experience this free horror game, embark on a creepy adventure to find the Heart of Pharaoh, overcome difficulties, meet new challenges and survive in the scary shrine!

name: Fight Buddy Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Ottoman
description: Sin descripción

name: A Story of a Company!
description: Sin descripción

name: Europe Front II
description: Sin descripción

name: Hananezumi
